Articles.Content:
Hi all !

I play KSP since a few months and i decided to subscribe on the forum !

Thank you for this great game !

I'm happy to play at the new version of KSP but I don't hide to you that I will have questions for you (maybe because I'm don't at ease with computers...) !

First : In the sandbox, after i have downloaded the new version and the new versions of my mods too, my winglet stoped to move ! And it isn't just a graphical bug, my plane don't take off like before !

Can someone help me ?

Sorry for my bad english, i'm French !

Problem solved : Ferram Aerospace Resarch caused problems. I'm now seeing to reinstate a version who works...

Edited October 28, 2014 by Fighter117

That's similar to me!

I played KSP for 7 months and then joined the forum.

So hello from the Czech Republic and welcome to the forum, Fighter117.
